entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 21 at 3:54AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Significant Snow Tonight Through Friday Night... A low pressure system moving over Central Alaska Range this morning will move east across the Interior through tonight. This will bring a significant amount of snow to the Interior south and east of Fairbanks through Friday night. Snow will taper off by Saturday morning.
